title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Dec 14 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Dec 14 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

C&B talk to Abigail Shrier, journalist and author of Irreversible Damage: The Transgender Craze Seducing Our Daughters. Andrew Cuomo ordered to return $5.1M in book money. C&B take calls. Stupid covid rules are about to screw pro sports leagues.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
